findings.title: State variable visibility is not set (SWC-108)
findings.description: The state variable's visibility is not explicitly set, which can lead to unintended access or modification.

findings.title: A control flow decision is made based on the block.timestamp environment variable (SWC-116)
findings.description: The contract uses the block.timestamp environment variable to make a control flow decision, which can be vulnerable to manipulation by miners.

findings.title: Block values as a proxy for time (SWC-116)
findings.description: A control flow decision is made based on the block.timestamp environment variable
